name: ItGetsBetter
description:
A simple game revolving around the exploration of a cube and the evolution of a game through development. Every level unlocks a new feature and there is a surprising twist at the end! Hope you enjoy! 

Game was designed, developed and created all by one guy.

John Watkins "Winflag"  age:15
